channel.title: 508 Client help?
channel.description:
... well me and my homies have made a server... but now we want a 508 to go with it!... but... whenever i run a 508 client... the thing loads but it wont load fully? ... it'll just get stuck on the white blank screen... and when i look at the .bat file that shows up it says this...
Error: Signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 Client:2196 | Java.lang.Runtime Exception
Wtf is wrong with 508 clients? i've tried all of em? none of em work! :( help me :(

item.title: 508 Client help?
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

You changed the JRE version?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client help?
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

no… that isnt helping me? … my source is a test beta source (leeched) from jagex-pk… it works … but the no 508 clients will? … its pissin me off! … i have a HD client… and a LD client both of them wont even load up! it opens up the screen… then stops at that? … do u want a picture on here?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client help?
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

lildude783:

… i have 1 of each … i’ve tested 3 508 clients… they all say [quote=“run.bat”]Error: Signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 Client:2196 | Java.lang.Runtime [/quote] … so ya … help … and not telling me wut client to use cuz i know which client to use

He is helping you, try to listen.

Are you sure your ‘‘508 source’’ is 508?
And if it’s HD, or LD?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client help?
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

… i have 1 of each … i’ve tested 3 508 clients… they all say

Error: Signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 Client:2196 | Java.lang.Runtime
… so ya … help … and not telling me wut client to use cuz i know which client to use

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client help?
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

If your client is HD you need a 508 HD client, if it is LD you need a LD 508 client.

If you don’t have the cache look for tonypker’s topic on how to get it in the tutorial section.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client help?
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

my source IS 508… i use a 317 or 377 client and it says that Unexpected Server Response… and i check my 508 CMD thing and it says Connection Accepted from ###.###.#.## … then i use a 508 client and it dont even load and says wut the code said earlier

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client help?
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

317 is a deob, 508 is a completely different deob.

You need a 317 client to run a 317 server, you need a 508 client to run a 508 server.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client help?
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

[quote=“lildude783, post:1, topic:278849”]… well me and my homies have made a server… but now we want a 508 to go with it!.. but… whenever i run a 508 client… the thing loads but it wont load fully? … it’ll just get stuck on the white blank screen… and when i look at the .bat file that shows up it says this…

Run.bat:

Error: Signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 Client:2196 | Java.lang.Runtime Exception

Wtf is wrong with 508 clients? i’ve tried all of em? none of em work!

help me :([/quote]

Your source must be 508 too,
and you need to have a .titana_cache_32.

Read full topic
